example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS بث) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM التلفزيون)) (NP-TMP (NOUN امس)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC السلطات)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اوقفت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_NUM 16) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC شخصا))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN استجواب) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN القضية)))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: That the authorities arrested 16 people for questioning are in this case.

example.arg: ان السلطات اوقفت 16 شخصا ل استجواب هم في هذه القضية .
